status: draft
shortDescription: "Declarations of constants do not need to be immediately initialized"
shortCorrection: "Declarations of constants need to be immediately initialized"

Constants declared with the keyword `const` can be just declared but only later initialized.

frontmatter.shortDescription: Declarations of constants do not need to be immediately initialized
frontmatter.shortCorrection: Declarations of constants need to be immediately initialized
